job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstronguAbout UsustrongppSweat Equity Ventures is a VC firm with a new model of investing meant to massively accelerate momentum and value We supercharge founding teams with worldclass talent in goto market business amp product strategy pricing sales operations and recruiting Our experts have built teams driven growth priced new SaaS offerings and built monetization for generational companies such as MongoDB LinkedIn Salesforce Uber Facebook and othersppbrppstronguJob OpportunityustrongppWe are looking for backend and frontend software engineers new grad to midlevel to hire fulltime within one of our startups ppbrppOur team focuses on forming and scaling technology startups innovating in areas such as GovTech Blockchain Education Productivity Zero Code Platforms Collaboration Security FinTech Machine Learning Internet of Things etc These companies range from early stage to growth stage startupsppbrppThese are FTE positions with our portfolio companies which range in industry and size The roles are onsite at locations such as San Francisco Los Angeles and New YorkppbrppstronguResponsibilitiesustrongpullispanWork in a highly collaborative fastpaced startup environmentnbspspanlilispanDevelop and ship backend or frontend features into productionspanlilispanOwn projects from the ground upspanliliSample technologies include Typescript Reactjs Vuejs Nodejs GraphQL Swift Web Assembly Kubernetes Docker AWS varies based on the company and roleliulpbrppstronguApplication ProcessustrongppWe will contact individuals as soon as we identify a potential match Once contacted a member of our team will explain our VC recruiting model get to know you better and share relevant startup opportunities within our portfolio with youp
